::Lord Jhiaxus::

Jhiaxus isn't far behind Windlord when he arrives at the crash sight. After a quick survey, Jhiaxus realizes that someone has already been there. He is able to track Windlord and Kup and follows a pursuit course.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  Windlord:
 
 windlord arrived to Kup's ship and dificulty take him off the ship 
 and drag him away, towards the forest in the oposite direction than 
 Jhiaxus.
 
 The only place that he knew that may exit a CR it was the old Maximal 
 ccity, it may be in ruins but windlord hopped that an old Cr may 
 fuction.
 
 He took Kup and set him over his shoulder and ran as quick he could 
 avoiding to be detected
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "xochitla2006" <xochitla2006@...> 
 wrote:
 >
 > OOC: this is an awer for your prays???
 > 
 > 
 > Nighlight:
 > 
 > Nighlight heard Kup's distress signal and told Salveo "Salveo!!! I 
 > meet that bot!!! it's afriend we must rescue him!!! QUICK!!!"
 > 
 > Windlord:
 > Windlord Picked it's signals and transformed to his vehicle mode 
 and 
 > flew at fast speed towards the coordinates hoping not arrive late.
 > 
 > 
 > OOC:
 > 
 > In next post he will arrive
 > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
 > >
 > > ::Lord Jhiaxus::
 > > 
 > > The advanced Decepticon fighter known as Lord Jhiaxus slowly 
 makes 
 > his way through a forest area. He is kocking down trees and 
 breaking 
 > up the landscape as he goes.
 > > 
 > > Jhiaxus: Primus, I hate organics. I can't wait untill our forces 
 > totally wipe this planet out of existence. Optimus Prime was a fool 
 > to have cut off all contact between Earth and Transformers after 
 the 
 > signing of the Pax Cybertronia. He must have never suspected that 
 > some Decepticons would escape to the other side of the galaxy to 
 > return well after the war had ended. These Maximals and Predacons 
 > only knew of Earths location via the Golden Disc, but I remember it 
 > so well. The pathetic humans now control their own star sector with 
 > no Transformer involvment. Leaving them wide open. Their whole race 
 > will pay for their ancestor's sins: for aiding the Autobots.
 > > 
 > > Jhiaxus' comm system picks up on Kup's signal, giving away Kup's 
 > crash location.
 > > 
 > > Jhiaxus: Oh I do hope that old Autobot is still alive. Shooting 
 him 
 > down isn't as satifying as crushing his spark in my bare hand!
 > > 
 > > Jhiaxus transforms to jet mode and heads for Kup's location.
 > > 
 > > OOC: I'm not having Rodimus pick up the signal yet because he is 
 in 
 > radio silence. Plus I wanted to get some involvent going in the 
 RPG, 
 > so I hoped someone else would respond.
 > > 
 > >         
 > > ---------------------------------
 > > Ahhh...imagining that irresistible "new car" smell?
 > >  Check outnew cars at Yahoo! Autos.
